name: Vending Machine Memory
description:
• The goal of the game is to challenge the player multi-tasking capability while providing some sort of entertainment.
  • There are 6 levels. Each level introduce a new product and each product vary in price.
  • Clicking an item will reduce your balance credit depending on the product price.
  • Wrongly clicking the item reduce your credit and you need re-insert if it's not enough.
  • Your goal is to click all the items in the order given while keeping the track the current balance you have in the machine.
  • Control: Mouse only
